name: rectangle-generator
description: For generating rectangle impulses with different frequency

scripts.run-test: export FREQ=1 && export POSITION=2 && node low-freq-generator/index.js
scripts.autorun-test: export FREQ=1 && export POSITION=2 && pm2 start low-freq-generator/index.js --name 'rectangel-generaror-test'

author: Volodymyr Tymets
